thread.title_full: Our five favourite easy-access savings accounts

author: Sophie Christie
title: Our five favourite easy-access savings accounts
text:
Comments 
Savers looking to deposit their money into an easy-access savings account may be disheartened by the crop of rates on offer, with most providers paying around 1.3pc. 
At the moment, that is the price not just for the central bank measures that have driven rates down, but also the price of easy access to your money. If you give up that flexbility for two years, via a fixed rate bond, and you can earn around one percentage point more. 
Slightly higher rates are offered on easy-access cash Isas, our pick of the best can be found here , but for those who have used their cash Isa allowance for this year (£15,240) will be unable to put any more money into a cash Isa account. 
Remember, there are alternative ways to save that people should consider, such as in current accounts and peer-to-peer lending. 
• Our pick of the best fixed-rate savings bonds BEST EASY-ACCESS ACCOUNTS 
BM Savings pays a rate of 1.5pc on balances of £1,000 or more. Savers with less to deposit will earn 0.5pc, as the account comes with a 12-month bonus of 1pc as long as the balance remains £1,000 or more. If on any day during the first year the balance drops below £1,000, the interest rate will be 0.5pc. 
Interest is paid annually, and savers can apply online only. 
Kent Reliance pays 1.45pc on balances above £1,000. Interest is paid annually or monthly. Apply online. 
Virgin Money pays 1.41pc on balances above £1. The interest rate reverts to 0.75pc if four or more withdrawals are made each year. Interest is paid annually or monthly. Apply online or in branch. 
Tesco Bank is offering 1.35pc on balances above £1. The rate includes a 0.6pc bonus for the first 12 months. Interest is paid annually. Apply online. 
Saga also pays 1.35pc , but on balances of £1,000 or more. The rate includes a 0.85 percentage point bonus for the first 12 months, and the account is for over-50s only. Interest paid annually or monthly.
